text: [Ej pajomʙar] Hargiz dar on masçid [ʙa namoz] naist, [zero] şoistatar ast dar masçide [ʙa namoz] ʙiistī, ki az rūzi naxust ʙar pojai parhezgorī ʙino şudaast. [Ore, masçidi Quʙost] Ki dar on, mardone hastand, ki dūst medorand, ki [az gunohu oludagī] poku pokiza gardand. Va Alloh taolo pokizagonro dūst medorad
